body.name: HWAYO 750GB External Hard Drive Portable 2.5'' Ultra Slim HDD Storage USB 3.0 for PC, Laptop, Mac, Chromebook, Xbox One (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 30 mins
features: High-capacity storage to go, fast data transfer rates, you can save and backup any files, movies, music, photos, games and more.
Simple & Ultra slim - Only 0.47 inch, the small, light weight enclosure features massive capacity and high quality and reliability.
Plug and Play - This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. Just plug and play with USB connection.
Ultra-fast Data Transfers - Works with USB3.0 and USB2.0 to deliver, up to 6Gbps transfer speed, which is about 10 times as fast as USB 2.0.
System Compatibility - It can compatible with PC, Desktop, Laptop, MacBook, Chromebook, Linux, Xbox One series consoles.
body.description: HWAYO Portable External Hard Drive 1. HWAYO portable hard drives with USB 3.0 and SATA port offer reliable, fast data transfer rates and universal connectivity with USB 2.0 and USB 3.0 devices. It's a great gift choose. 2. Simple & Ultra slim - Sleek, all aluminum enclosure for durability, Seamless connection. The small, light weight enclosure features massive capacity and high quality and reliability. 3. Plug and Play - This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. 4. Ultra-fast Data Transfers - Works with USB3.0 and SATA cable to deliver, allows up to 6Gbps transfer speed. 5. Auto sleep when not operated for 10min function to prevent body heat and cut consumption. 6. System Compatibility - It is compatible with Windows 7/8/8.1/10, Mac, Linux, Android OS and more. It's suitable for PC, Desktop, Laptop, MacBook, Chromebook, Xbox One, Xbox One S series consoles. 7. By default, This HWAYO portable hard drive is formatted as EXFAT. You can Reformat it if you want to use it on your specific requirements. System: Windows7/8/8.1/10, Format Support: FAT/FAT32/NTFS/EXFAT System: Mac，Format Support: APFS/EXFAT System: Linux , Format: EXT2/EXT3/EXT4 System: Android ，Format: FAT32/NTFS System: Xbox360 ，Format: FAT32 System: Xbox one， Format: EXFAT/FAT32 System: PS 4, Format: EXFAT/FAT32 Package included: 1 x Portable External Hard Drive 1 x USB3.0 to SATA Cable 1 x User Manual Note: As the manufacture use the different measurement standard , the theory 1MB is 1024 bytes on manufacturing process, 1GB=1,000MB / 1.024 / 1.024 / 1.024 = about 931 MB. According to this proverbial situation, the drive will display lower capacity. 40GB≈37GB60GB≈56GB 80GB≈74GB120GB≈111GB 160GB≈149GB250GB≈232GB 320GB≈298GB500GB≈465GB 750GB≈698GB1TB≈931GB

productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 484 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Compact, easy to use, plug-n-play. Bought it to back up the old computer before setting up the new one. Works fine. Held everything with space left over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Review of External Hard Drive
reviews.reviewText: It is not user intuitive and is not always recognized by MacBook Pro. A manual would be helpful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space is great.
reviews.reviewText: Love that it has enough space and love how small and compact it is to fit anywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: First off, It was my mistake to buy a cheap external hard-drive instead of an expensive but good quality one. After the first couple of days of use, the hard drive refused to show up on my laptop, and had to wait a good 10 mins. The External hard drive also has a loud irritating noise when plugged into your device so expect that. For the icon to pop up for me to access my photos. Sadly after in use for 3 weeks, the external hard-drive for no apparent reason just died on me. The icon never popped up again and the loud noise became fainter as time passed. I always clicked on the "eject USB" so that's taken out of the equation. I think the hard truth is that I lost all my photos on the External Hard drive. Hopefully, I can recover them with a data recovering company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good buy
reviews.reviewText: The product was received quickly andworked just ad I expected it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roku live TV compatible
reviews.reviewText: Update: 6 months and it's still working well.Works well with them roku live TV pause. Usb flash drives were wearing out too quickly. Hopefully this will last a few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the cost
reviews.reviewText: This external storage has been a lifesaver.
